channel.title: Brom on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Brom on Strat

item.title: Slewfoot - A Tale of Bewitchery
item.description: Tight and fun story. Suffers from being a little bit too predictable for my taste. It’s playing with a lot of similar elements as Brom’s other work I’ve read, The Child Thief, things like fairies, the Horned God, but Slewfoot is more successful in execution (pun intended) and more nuanced and polished.

item.title: The Child Thief
item.description: An edgy retelling of Peter Pan by Brom, the illustrator who’s work you’ve definitely seen before (Doom II, Diablo II).
